match_score.reasoning: All three candidate videos are essentially identical, featuring the same official recording of 'O Let Me Weep, For Ever Weep' by Jennifer Vyvyan and the English Chamber Orchestra, conducted by Benjamin Britten. They are all provided by Universal Music Group via the 'Jennifer Vyvyan - Topic' channel, and share the same ℗ 1971 Decca Music Group Limited copyright. The titles, performers, and composers perfectly match the soundtrack metadata. Candidate 2 is selected as the best match due to having the highest number of views and likes among the three, indicating it is the most popular or widely accessed version of this specific recording on YouTube.
key_factors: Exact match for song title 'O Let Me Weep, For Ever Weep'.
Exact match for performer 'Jennifer Vyvyan, English Chamber Orchestra'.
Authentic and official recording provided by Universal Music Group (Decca Music Group Limited).
Highest popularity (views and likes) among the identical candidate videos.
concerns: None of the candidate videos or their descriptions explicitly mention the movie 'Hable con ella', which is part of the soundtrack metadata. This means the direct cinematic context is not present in the YouTube metadata.
